title: Cole & Mason London Pepper Mill, Grind Select Adjustable Coarseness, Chocolate Wood, 180mm, Refillable Manual Grinder
features: Select Your Coarseness: Featuring Cole & Mason’s innovative grind select functionality, allowing you to choose between very fine, and a coarse grind
Easy to Refill: Simply unscrew the knob and remove the top
Timeless Iconic British Design: Crafted from high-grade beech wood with Art-Deco influence the London Mill is perfect for any kitchen or dining table
Precision+ Grinding Mechanism: Features Cole & Mason’s durable, carbon steel mechanism for consistent performance and long-lasting sharpness.
Trusted British Brand Since 1919: Cole & Mason is known for quality, innovation, and timeless style – a must-have for home cooks and food lovers.
description: Made from high-grade beech wood, the London mill both honours Cole & Mason’s rich heritage and looks to the future with a classic, yet contemporary aesthetic. Its timeless design will prove a stylish addition to both traditional and modern kitchens. The shape of the mill has been inspired by the beautiful Art Deco and industrial British architecture that can be found throughout the city of London, the birthplace of Cole & Mason. Featuring Cole & Mason’s innovative grind select functionality, the pepper mill comes with 6 grind settings and the salt mill with 3. By moving the grind select band along the dots, you can easily change the grind from fine to coarse, giving you complete control when seasoning your dishes. Covered by a lifetime guarantee, pepper mills are fitted with the Cole & Mason design registered Precision+ carbon steel mechanism, salt mills are fitted with an ultra-sharp, anti-corrosion ceramic mechanism. At Cole & Mason we share your enthusiasm for a more adventurous range of seasoning and flavour enhancing products. We understand how new and exciting ingredients along with high quality kitchen tools and accessories can transform cooking and dining experiences. We have been designing and developing kitchenware from our head office in England since 1919. We offer a well-established and intuitively designed range, with a product for every seasoning task from the kitchen to the table. Whether you need a manual or electronic mill, simple shakers, dry or fresh herb & spice products, pestle & mortar or an oil & vinegar pourer, all our products are manufactured with the highest quality materials and available in a wide range of finishes.
